name: UpdateMiroTag
description:
Update a tag on a Miro board.

This tool updates a specific tag on a Miro board using the provided board and tag IDs. Note that changes made via the API will not be visible in real time on the board; a page refresh is required to see updates.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the tag update should occur.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update a specific tag.

parameters.name: tag_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the tag you want to update on a Miro board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the tag that you want to update.

parameters.name: tag_fill_color
parameters.description: Specify the fill color for the tag. Choices are: red, light_green, cyan, yellow, magenta, green, blue, gray, violet, dark_green, dark_blue, black.

parameters.name: tag_title
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive text of the tag to be updated.

value_schema.description: Text of the tag. Case-sensitive. Must be unique.
